Reviews.Title: Only OK
Reviews.Author: Jim Duyer
Reviews.Content: The sound fluctuates terribly between calls.  Many times you are unable to eitherhear or be heard.  Sorry because it was a good idea, but actually it acts more orless as a "gimic"  or toy to impress your fellow geeks.  Too bad it doesn't also functionas a cell phone very well.

Reviews.Title: SVP G13 Cell Phone Watch Review
Reviews.Author: Tyrel "Brandon"
Reviews.Content: This cell phone watch is awesome you can buy any sim card to put in it and you can buy any micro sd card to put in it. I would definitely recommend this cell phone watch to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Need some improvement
Reviews.Author: JERRY FARAJALLA
Reviews.Content: It is good product but the microphone and the voice or the sound is too low barely you can hear someone if they can enhance the speakers and the Microphone to works like the small transistor pocket Radio or like any cell phone speaker that would be helpful and awesome.

Reviews.Title: recomendado
Reviews.Author: Freddy
Reviews.Content: saludo desde venezuela muy recomendado producto es exelente gracias me encanta espero poder comprar otro en las siguientes oportunidades mas
